meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>cloudy</kanji> and the verb vocab version means <vocabulary>to get cloudy</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to become cloudy</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji. It also happens to be the same as 雲, which has a very similar meaning (clouds).
